description: Tables showing a) average (mean) number of weeks sanction for Jobseeker's Allowance recipients sanctioned on first offence for refusal of employment - 1st October 2005 to 31st July 2007 b) Total number of individual Jobseeker's Allowance recipients sanctioned on first offence for refusal of employment - 1st April 2000 to 31st July 2007 c) Total number of sanctions applied to recipients of Jobseeker's Allowance for refusal of employment - 1st April 2000 to 31st July 2007. 24 p.
